      Constructs a new Player with a specified ID and name.

      name - : name of the player

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the player.
      Returns:
      name of the player

    • get_id

      public int get_id()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the player.
      Returns:
      the player's ID as an integer

    • get_currentObjectiveIndex

      public int get_currentObjectiveIndex()
      Retrieves the index of the player's current objective.
      Returns:
      current objective index of the player, ranging from 0 to 5

    • getCurrentTile

      public Position getCurrentTile()
      Retrieves the current tile position of the player within the labyrinth.
      Returns:
      : current Position object representing the player's tile coordinates on the gameboard

    • get_lastPosition

      public Position get_lastPosition()
      Retrieves the last position of the player.
      Returns:
      a Position

    • setLastPosition

      public void setLastPosition(Position position)
      Attributes a last position value.
      Parameters:
      position - : a Position instance

    • getCards

      public Card[] getCards()
      Retrieves the player's current set of objective cards.
      Returns:
      an array of Card objects representing the player's objectives

    • setCurrentTile

      public void setCurrentTile(Position position)
      Sets the current tile position of the player within the labyrinth.
      Parameters:
      position - : Position object representing the new tile coordinates on the gameboard

    • setCards

      public void setCards(Card[] cards)
      Sets the player's current set of objective cards.
      Parameters:
      cards - : an array of Card objects representing the new set of objective cards for the player

    • getCurrentObjective

      public Card getCurrentObjective()
      Retrieves the player's current objective card.
      Returns:
      : current Card object representing the player's current objective

    • completeCurrentObjective

      public void completeCurrentObjective()
      Advances the player to the next objective in their list of objective cards. If the current objective is not the last one in the player's list, the current objective index is incremented, allowing progress towards the next objective.

    • hasCompletedAllObjectives

      public boolean hasCompletedAllObjectives()
      Checks whether the player has completed all their objectives. It iterates through the player's objective cards and verifies if each card's treasure has been found.
      Returns:
      true if all objective cards are marked as found; false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string representation of the Player object, including the player's name and their current objective number (1-indexed).
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the player's name and the current objective number.
